title: Tamil Eelam aspirants must ask how ‘Liberated’ the people of Kosovo are?
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The lies to create Kosovo’s ‘independence’ are many. Allegation that 225,000 ethnic Albanian men aged between 14 and 59 were missing or presumed dead was made by US Ambassador-at-large David Scheffer. It was an invention. In 2000, the International War Crimes Tribunal announced that the final count of…
